imdb.plot outline: Creator and host David Naglieri focuses his eye on a series of contemporary issues which reveal Catholic individuals or groups who impact the world with their faith and whose stories are oftentimes misunderstood. From the controversy over Pius XII and the Holocaust to the current battles over Catholic Education, Eye on the Church is investigative journalism with a redemptive message.
imdb.title: Eye on the Church
plot: Creator and host David Naglieri focuses his eye on a series of contemporary issues which reveal Catholic individuals or groups who impact the world with their faith and whose stories are oftentimes misunderstood.
